issue.message: Call requires API level 18 (current min is 16): `android.os.Bundle#getBinder`

Call requires API level 18 (current min is 16): `android.os.Bundle#getBinder`

This call references a method added in API level 17; however, the containing class androidx.browser.browseractions.BrowserActionsIntent is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
